subject: Awards, Decorations and Honors
Baseball
Records and Achievements
lead_paragraph: The Tigers’ Miguel Cabrera is tantalizingly close to doing what Babe Ruth and Hank Aaron could not: enter baseball’s musty triple crown fraternity, which has admitted no new members in 45 years.
snippet: The Tigers’ Miguel Cabrera is tantalizingly close to doing what Babe Ruth and Hank Aaron could not: enter baseball’s musty triple crown fraternity, which has admitted no new members in 45 years.
